segments.text: How can she just stand there while the sink overflows like that?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is pouring everywhere, soaking the floor and cabinets—it's infuriating!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those kids are climbing on that unstable stool, risking everything for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is stretching so far, one wrong move and he'll crash down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is egging him on, both of them breaking rules right under her nose.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Look at that puddle widening; someone's going to slip and get hurt because of this negligence.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's polishing that stupid plate while the whole kitchen floods—what is wrong with her?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window shows a perfect garden, but inside it's a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe no one's paying attention; this is so irresponsible.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar is tempting them, but sneaking like this is just wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If I were there, I'd yell to turn off the faucet right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene boils my blood with all the avoidable hazards.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They better fix this before it's too late—argh!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The apron and dress make her look proper, but her obliviousness is maddening.
segments.speaker: PAR
